subtitle: so I'm this is very interesting because

that I have been given to give although
there is no time so just to bear that in
mind from the very beginning and I'd
like to start with you ask you to
imagine something imagine you are in the

and it is just before dawn on the summer

sacred monument on the Salisbury Plain

middle of the stone circle that friends
is a moment in time and that is what I

meaning the significance of a moment in

as most of you know from a deeply

illusion time does not exist there is no

happens in the moment there is no past

the plane of the self the center of
consciousness of our true nature is
completely outside of time and any of
you who've had an experience of that

there I was in fact given an experience
of that dimension that reality in my

disturbing
experience that took me six months to

consciousness of time I was 23 I was
happened to be living with my mother at

that is the the reality of the self is
called Ananda my Akasha in Sanskrit the

ourselves there is no time the never-was
time the never will be time which is why

present weather is no time and that is

regard to time it does not exist and yet
when I was 23 I'd actually took a year

yeah and I had to come back into time to

actually for some reason i used the

and that is this time bound

does not exist for them at all in the
